resources.string:
Featured Wallpapers ver2.2 
 Author:Keel 
 Contact:keel.sike@gmail.com 

 Info:These featured Wallpapers were carefully chosen and meticulously prepared to look great for your android handset.

1.This app need an available Internet connection, and access to SD card.

 2.For high-resolution screen, ensure the picture quality.

 3.Horizontal scrolling for large preview. 

 4.Automatic Update.

 5.For more informations,mail to: keel.sike@gmail.com , thanks.
One picture load faild, please check the internet connection and try again.
Can not get the remote datas, please check the internet connection and try again.
Synchronize my stars failed, please check the internet connection and try again.
Add Star failed, please check the internet connection and try again.
Remove Star failed, please check the internet connection and try again.
Can not connect to the network.
Sorry,you need to get a internet connection.
Get index failed!Please exit and start again!
New version is now available!Check it now?
Please wait for the picture downloaded.
oh?Failed to load the picture,back and try again!
Failed to save!Please insert the SD card!
You can find the pictures in [wallpaper] directory in SD card or press the center button to set as wallpaper now.
